title: Fate's Mistake
description: *Can be read as a stand alone novel***Intended for readers 18+**He was the perfect gentleman, and my parents adored him. In time, I learned to adore him too. I married him. He was my forever.Until the day he hit me.Five years went by with the speed of a ticking clock, counting down my life one painful second at a time.Until Danny. Danny saw me. Danny was my hero.Danny was the one I was supposed to be with.But now I’m broken, shattered into pieces too jagged to fit back together.Isn’t that what fate is? Puzzles fit together by an unseen hand to form a life worth living.So when fate makes a mistake, who fixes it?
author: Brandace Morrow
